name: Swarmlake
description: Dance with billions of enemies in the ultra-intense shooter Swarmlake.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD A6 @ 2.4GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 240 / AMD Radeon HD 4670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 14 MB available space Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3+
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX @ 2.4GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 470 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 Storage: 14 MB available space Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3+
